name: Lost Memories (arashi_dark, Pinkiibiza, luismb55, borch)
description:
~~~

Find & share memories in a room.

~~~

CONTROLS

  • Mouse: Move camera and interact.
  • Keyboard: WASD to move, Enter to confirm, Esc to cancel or exit.

~~~

Leave meaningful messages in symbolic objects and share them with friends and strangers alike.

After writing messages in the selected objects, download the QR Code image and share it to whoever you want! Loading it is as easy as clicking the Find Memories button and then upload the QR!

Move around and interact with the objects to write or find the messages scattered in the room.

~~~
